replies.body: What about a Dunkmaster {{champion:254}} ? I'd also love to see a Dodgeball Queen {{champion:134}} from the Academy Adventures comic. There should also be a Dawnbringer {{champion:10}} and {{champion:89}} with a Nightbringer {{champion:25}} and {{champion:131}}

the star guardian line is like an anime thing, starring young people, mostly girls. I don't think taric fits. he'd look like a predator next to the rest of the cast :0

wtf are u talking about, i like the starguardian skins and im a dude, and no, im not gay, or trans or whatever, just because its about magical girls (and ezreal) doesnt mean its aimed at young people or girls, thats dumb stereotype

the characters are all high schoolers excluding syndra.

I guess they can try to do a high school lookin version of taric but that would be pretty weird to me
